mapper.sql: Id, create_time, last_update_time, content, type, status
mapper.update: update e_edit_log set status=0 where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into e_edit_log ( create_time, last_update_time, content, type, status) values (#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
